description:
Great, but not works well if dash to panel extension is enabled.

The wallpapers got are ofter not suitable for my interest because it is very random and not categorized. I like to see nature, but i got LGBT wallpaper that might cause some trouble if other person see the wallpaper. If the wallpapers can be categorized, it might be very usefull.

For the extension users, only enable auto fetching if very random wallpapers will not cause the problem for you and who see your wallpaper.
summary: Great, but some bug and very random wallpaper

description: I'd like to use random local pictures recursively.
Test it in Fedora 29 working fine
Many tools to customize your wallpaper on desktop. I expect more sites to be supported, but they are already enough for me. The feature you can see the history is also nice.
It works as expected. Shows beautiful wallpapers from unsplash.

Ein Mega Programm Lässt sich leicht bedienen. Ideal ist, wenn man die gewünschten Themen für ein "Random Wallpaper" mit englischen Begriffen eingibt. Man kann auch mehrere Begriffe wählen (z.B. "birds, raven, nature"). Und man kann die Zeit vorgeben, wie lange ein Wallpaper angezeigt wird, bevor es automatisch wechselt
summary: Mega Programm. Leicht und intuitiv zu konfigurieren, tolle Bilder

description: Отличное расширение, даже не надо ничего устанавливать. Поставил и пользуешся.
